heading: HR01003
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE EXISTING SYSTEM AND PROCESSES OF THE LAND TRANSPORTATION OFFICE (LTO) WITH REGARD TO THE REGISTRATION OF ELECTRONIC CARS AND VEHICLES WITH THE PURPOSE OF PROMOTING ALTERNATIVE MODES OF TRANSPORTATION WHICH WILL HELP REDUCE AIR POLLUTION IN THE COUNTRY
status: Pending with the Committee on TRANSPORTATION since 2017-05-24
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01003
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE EXISTING SYSTEM AND PROCESSES OF THE LAND TRANSPORTATION OFFICE (LTO) WITH REGARD TO THE REGISTRATION OF ELECTRONIC CARS AND VEHICLES WITH THE PURPOSE OF PROMOTING ALTERNATIVE MODES OF TRANSPORTATION WHICH WILL HELP REDUCE AIR POLLUTION IN THE COUNTRY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : LOPEZ, MANUEL LUIS T.
DATE FILED : 2017-05-16
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION ON 2017-05-24
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-05-17;
